title: Should Houston Have Been Evacuated Before Harvey?
description: Bill King, former mayor of Kemah, Texas, and the head of a study that investigated the fallout from Hurricane Rita, joins Chuck Todd to talk about the decision to shelter in place in the face of heavy flooding from Hurricane Harvey.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
